name: SNAEGO
description:
A one button version of snake made made over the course of a month as part of the LEGO Ninjago Game Jam hosted in October 2021.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Collect gold bricks to grow and increase your score
  • Press spacebar or left click to turn
  • The snake will turn towards any gold bricks nearby
  • The snake will turn away from red bricks and walls
